name: Pangoro
author: Naoki Saito
flavor_text: It charges ahead and bashes its opponents like a berserker, uncaring about any hits it might take. Its arms are mighty enough to snap a telephone pole.

attacks.name: Parting Shot
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 60 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Buster Swing
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance.
